thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 2 of 1742
thread.title: Adam

author: Adam
title: Adam
text: I ordered two tickets 4 months in advance. CheapOAir advert listed similiar prices but at the time of booking they increased the price by somewhere around $100.00!!! I got two calls from them trying to get me into 'the best possible deal due to high demand for this destination'. Seriously? Four months in advance - Los Angeles to Denver routndtrip, laughable !! FlightHub came at the lower price with no hassle at all. Same days of travel, no bs negotiations - most def recommended
